name: All I Got For My Birthday Was This Terrible Curse
name_original: All I Got For My Birthday Was This Terrible Curse
description:
48-hour jam game for Ludum Dare 45.

It’s your 13th birthday and you have been cursed by a wizard! Every year, all of your belongings turn to ash and everyone forgets you exist. How awful!

Start as a homeless orphan and work your way up to the top, every single year! Maybe you’ll be able to cure that ridiculous curse before it’s too late…

A five-year rapidfire life sim. Features:

  • Shopping
  • Slimes
  • Practical Conversation Tips
  • A Horse
  • Several endings
  • Nine achievements to score

Have fun - and don’t die of exposure!
